content: this legal text discusses the division of assets between two parties mr dvvi and dveg the assets consist of various properties in municipality castelfidardo including apartments and garages the text provides specific information about each property such as the number of rooms cadastral data and cadastral value both parties agree to divide the assets into two shares with each party receiving certain properties the value of each share is set at euro 67000 the text also mentions a sale but does not provide any further details
